Package dedede.model.persistence.daos

Class MediumDao

java.lang.Object
dedede.model.persistence.daos.MediumDao
public final class MediumDao
extends java.lang.Object
This DAO (data access object) manages data pertaining to a medium or a copy. A medium describes general library entities, of which several copies may exist. Specifically, this DAO implements the CRUD methods (create, read, update, delete). See the MediumDto class for the used DTO.

  • Method Details

    • createMedium

      public static void createMedium​(MediumDto mediumDto)
      Enters medium data into the persistent data store. The enclosed ID must not be associated with an existing data entry in the data store.
      Parameters:
      mediumDto - A DTO container with the overwriting data
      See Also:
      MediumDto

    • updateMedium

      public static void updateMedium​(MediumDto mediumDto)
      Overwrites existing medium data in the persistent data store. The enclosed ID is used to remove existing data from the persistent data store.
      Parameters:
      mediumDto - A DTO container with the overwriting data
      See Also:
      MediumDto

    • deleteMedium

      public static void deleteMedium​(MediumDto mediumDto)
      Deletes existing medium data in the persistent data store. The enclosed ID is used to remove existing data from the persistent data store.
      Parameters:
      mediumDto - A DTO container with the ID of the entry to be deleted
      See Also:
      MediumDto

    • loadMedium

      public static MediumDto loadMedium()

    • getAllMediums

      public static java.util.List<MediumDto> getAllMediums​(int pageSize, int pageNumber)
      Fetches a paged list of mediums from the persistent data store. The order of the data and concurrent behaviour is unspecified.
      Parameters:
      pageSize - The number of data elements being returned
      pageNumber - The page number in the conceptual data order, referring to the page size
      Returns:
      A paginated list of DTO containers with the category data.
      See Also:
      MediumDto

    • searchMediums

      public static java.util.List<MediumDto> searchMediums​(java.lang.String text, int pageSize, int pageNumber)
      Fetches a paged list of mediums from the persistent data store, for which a search filter is applied to the name first. The order of the data and concurrent behaviour is unspecified.
      Parameters:
      text - The search term (case-insensitive), which the name must contain
      pageSize - The number of data elements being returned
      pageNumber - The page number in the conceptual data order, referring to the page size
      Returns:
      A paginated list of DTO containers with the category data.
      See Also:
      MediumDto

    • updateCopy

      public static void updateCopy​(CopyDto copyDto)
      Overwrites existing medium copy data in the persistent data store. The enclosed ID is used to remove existing data from the persistent data store.
      Parameters:
      copyDto - A DTO container with the overwriting data
      See Also:
      CopyDto

    • deleteCopy

      public static void deleteCopy​(CopyDto copyDto)
      Deletes existing medium-copy data in the persistent data store. The enclosed ID is used to remove existing data from the persistent data store.
      Parameters:
      copyDto - A DTO container with the ID of the entry to be deleted
      See Also:
      CopyDto

    • createCopy

      public static void createCopy​(CopyDto copyDto)
      Enters medium-copy data into the persistent data store. The enclosed ID must not be associated with an existing data entry in the data store.
      Parameters:
      copyDto - A DTO container with the overwriting data
      See Also:
      CopyDto

    • loadCopy

      public static CopyDto loadCopy​(java.lang.String signatureLocation)
      Fetches a medium-copy, identified from its signature, from the persistent data store.
      Parameters:
      signatureLocation - The medium-copy signature, which identifies the specific medium-copy.
      Returns:
      A DTO container with the medium-copy data for the given signature.
      See Also:
      CopyDto

    • getAllOverdueCopies

      public static java.util.List<CopyDto> getAllOverdueCopies()
      Fetches a list of all overdue medium-copies from the persistent data store. The list contains overdue material from all users, globally.
      Returns:
      A list of DTO containers with the medium-copy data.
      See Also:
      CopyDto

    • getAllCopiesByMediums

      public static java.util.List<CopyDto> getAllCopiesByMediums​(MediumDto mediumDto)
      Fetches a list of all medium-copies belonging to a specific medium from the persistent data store.
      Parameters:
      mediumDto - A DTO container for a medium, carrying the relevant medium-ID.
      Returns:
      A list of DTO containers with the medium-copy data.
      See Also:
      CopyDto

    • lendCopy

      public static void lendCopy​(CopyDto copyDto, UserDto userDto)
      Registers that a specific medium-copy has been checked out by a specific user. Until it is returned, it is unavailable to other users.
      Parameters:
      copyDto - A DTO container for a medium-copy, carrying the relevant copy-ID.
      userDto - A DTO container for a user, carrying the relevant user-ID.
      See Also:
      CopyDto

    • returnCopy

      public static void returnCopy​(CopyDto copyDto, UserDto userDto)
      Registers that a specific medium-copy has been returned by a specific user. It is then available to other users for check-out.
      Parameters:
      copyDto - A DTO container for a medium-copy, carrying the relevant copy-ID.
      userDto - A DTO container for a user, carrying the relevant user-ID.
      See Also:
      CopyDto
